description: Ireland's National Public Health Emergency Team recommends moving to level 5 Covid-19 restrictions.
title: Coronavirus: Further restrictions coming for Republic of Ireland
title_page: Coronavirus: Further restrictions coming for Republic of Ireland - BBC News
maintext: Mr Harris said no system would achieve a goal of zero Covid-19 cases and instead suggested the country should aim to look at other countries like Israel, which managed to get the R rate to 0.8.
